value.name: Fact-finding review scheduled Monday on death of Robert Wenman
value.description: Monday there will be a fact-finding review surrounding the death of Robert Wenman. Wenman was killed during an officer-involved shooting last year on June 22.

video.name: Fact-finding review scheduled Monday on death of Robert Wenman

value.name: Man killed in standoff with NLV police reportedly made suicidal statements
value.description: Robert Wenman, 63, was killed by a North Las Vegas SWAT team sniper last year following hours of negotiations during a standoff in a park.

video.name: Man killed in standoff with NLV police reportedly made suicidal statements
